descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/upload/sagittarius22/sagittarius22_1348330831_Capture.jpg[/img][/center]


[b]Version:[/b] 1.0

[b]Author:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=972816]Sagittarius22[/url]

[b]Category:[/b] Gameplay

[b]Requirement:[/b] [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender[/url] *optional*

[b]Description:[/b] This mod enables racial abilities for NPC\'s. They will use them in combat; Khajiits don\'t use them because their power is a night-eye ability, which is pointless for NPC\'s.
It will work for all vanilla races. If you want to see notifications, type in the console:
set _SAGNotificationsGV to 1
This will require SKSE though.

[b]Install[/b]: Put the files included in the DATA folder, in your Skyrim\\DATA folder and check this md with your favorite mod manager!

[center][img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/upload/sagittarius22/sagittarius22_1330707422_Moorelf_1328629167_logo_sagittarius3.png[/img][/center]
author: Sagittarius22
